delayToKill.description: Time in milliseconds to wait after sending a SIGINT and before sending a SIGKILL to a command. Can be defined both command-wide and global-wide. The command version, if it exists, takes precedence. Defaults to 1000.

fatalIfErr.description: Whether to skip subsequent commands in case the current one returns an error. Can be defined both command-wide and global-wide. The command version, if it exists, takes precedence. Defaults to false.

cmds.description: List of commands to be executed sequentially.

ignoreGlobs.description: List of glob patterns to be ignored when watching.
